name: Fever 2017
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

FEVER: Hover-Car Racing for 4 players! Shake off your opponents or push them off the track to win. But be careful, each lap the obstacles and bonuses on the track are positioned randomly!

Platform : PC / Engine : Unreal Engine 4
Number of players : 1 to 4

Producer : Anthony FASSIN
Game Design : Julien CAPELLE
Game Art : Marine COIFFARD, Aurélien  ZAFRA, Morgane BELFORT, Maxime QUISSAC
Game Programming : Kenny ALVES de SOUSA, Adam KIBOUH, Jonathan Lecavelier
Game Design & Programming : Nasim  BOUGUERRA
Music & Sound Design : Louis FABRE
